org.trianacode.gui.main.imp

Class ForShowMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.ForShowMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ContainerListener, java.util.EventListener, NodeListener, TaskGraphListener

    public class ForShowMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements NodeListener, TaskGraphListener, java.awt.event.ContainerListener
    A class to monitor the for show tool for a node and update the main triana when applicable.
